attributes.action: Lower fuel prices back to £1/£1.20 a litre.
attributes.additional_details: Lower the cost of fuel. As they are getting to greedy with all the tax they are putting on it.
attributes.background: Lower the cost of fuel. As people can’t afford all the increase of tax due to the government.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about fuel prices are a matter for retailers, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Reduce fuel duty and VAT by 40% for a period of 2 years: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599089

Set up an independent regulator to monitor and regulate vehicle fuel pricing: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/605282
